headline: Edison International, Southern California Edison Declare Q3 Dividends
summary: ROSEMEAD, Calif., August 28, 2025--The board of directors of Edison International (NYSE: EIX) today declared the following dividends, payable Sept. 15, 2025, to shareholders of record on Sept. 1, 2025:
